name: Washed Up (AnthonyLaVigna)
description:
Washed Up is an arcade-style, top-down, zombie, shooter game that is near completion. This has been my passion project and entry into game design for the past 7 months, and I am proud of what I have created so far. I will be adding the finishing touches soon but the game feels ready to be played as is.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • E - Interact
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Right Click - Dash
  • R - Reload
  • ESC - Open/close menu
  • F1 - Hide UI
  • F11 - Fullscreen
